definitions.definition: (the power of) speech, language (the faculty of using spoken language to communicate or express thought, the usage of this faculty, and the words articulated through its use)

parsedExamples.example: perdre la parole / perdre l'usage de la parole
parsedExamples.translation: to lose one's ability to speak
to speak easily, to be well-spoken

examples: perdre la parole / perdre l'usage de la parole
